name: Land of the Leprechauns
description:
Land of the Leprechauns is a puzzle platformer. Sneak into the tiny land of the leprechauns to reclaim your riches, and escape without being discovered by your tiny foes!

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam (July 2020). Theme: Tiny World.

Relevance to the theme: a puzzle platformer set in a tiny world, with giant treasures. After shrinking to the size of his tiny foes, the player is able to enter the land of the leprechauns.

Made by Sage7 using the Godot engine. Sage7 is a small team of self-taught beginners. This is our second game, and our second game jam! A majority of the code and assets were made in the jam's time frame.

Playthrough: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_wH73kH_nOo&feature=emb_title

Third-party assets

Tileset: https://kenney.nl/assets/topdown-shooter - License: (CC0 1.0 Universal)
Parallax background: https://opengameart.org/content/3-parallax-backgrounds - license: GPL 3

Source: https://gitlab.com/hussainm89/godotwildjam23
